Description:
Detects usage of system utilities such as "find", "tree", "findmnt", etc, to discover files, directories and network shares.


Author: Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community, CheraghiMilad
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File and Directory Discovery - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/file' and command re '(.){200,}') or (process_path like '%/ls' and command like '%-r%') or process_path like '%/find' or process_path like '%/tree' or process_path like '%/findmnt' or process_path like '%/mlocate')
